name: @opengovsg/ts-template
description: A template for most TypeScript projects in OGP
author: Open Government Products, GovTech Singapore (https://open.gov.sg)

scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix shared install
scripts.dev: npm run all "docker-compose up" "./wait-for-it.sh localhost:5432 -t 0 -- npm run dev:app"
scripts.build: npm run on-shared build && npm run all "npm:on-*end build"
scripts.coverage: npm run on-backend -- test:cov && cat backend/coverage/lcov.info > lcov.info
